feed.title: Ultimate Tennis Statistics Feed
feed.subtitle: Ultimate Tennis Statistics - the Ultimate Tennis Statistics destination for die-hard tennis fans

entry.title: New Feature - Weeks at Elo Top 5 'GOAT' Points
entry.summary: New Feature - 'GOAT' Points for weeks at Elo Top 5 (see 'GOAT' Legend) to better reflect domination over fellow players in the same Era

div.p: 'GOAT' Points for weeks at Elo Top 5 (see 'GOAT' Legend) to better reflect domination over fellow players in the same Era

entry.title: New Feature - Tournament Forecasts
entry.summary: New Feature - Tournament Event Forecasts based on the Neural Network Match Prediction Algorithm

div.p:
Tournament Forecasts - Tournament Event Forecasts based on the Neural Network Match Prediction Algorithm with ~50 neurons for different features about players like Elo Rating, Surface Elo Rating, ATP Ranking, ATP Points, Head-to-Head ratios and Winning Percentages varied by surface, tournament level, round, recency, match or set ratios, vs rank, vs hand, vs backhand...
Neural Network is trained on historical data for highest prediction rates to determine optimal feature weights.

entry.title: New Feature - Head-to-Head Charts
entry.summary: New Feature - Head-to-Head Charts - Ranking, performance and statistics charts for comparing head-to-head players

div.p: Head-to-Head Charts - Ranking, performance and statistics charts for comparing head-to-head players

entry.title: New Feature - Filtering by Statistics Conditions
entry.summary: New Feature - Filtering by Statistics Conditions - Player matches and tournaments can be filtered by statistics conditions

div.p: Filtering by Statistics Conditions - Player matches and tournaments can be filtered by statistics conditions (advanced filter), like filter all tournaments with 1st serve % >= 75%

entry.title: New Feature - Seasons Browser
entry.summary: New Feature - Seasons Browser - Browse seasons and check season details

div.p: Seasons Browser - Browse seasons and check season records, tournaments, rankings, performance, statistics and 'GOAT' points distribution among top players.

entry.title: New Feature - Head-to-Head
entry.summary: New Feature - Head-to-head between two players with Hypothetical Matchup prediction

div.p: Head-to-Head - Head-to-head between two players with H2H matches, performance and statistics comparision and hypothetical matchup prediction based on neural network algorithm.

entry.title: New Feature - Statistics Comparision
entry.summary: New Feature - Statistics comparision - Compare match or selected matches statistics with career, season, tournament level or surface statistics

div.p: Statistics comparision - Compare match or selected matches statistics with career, season, tournament level or surface statistics.
